name: Rong (Reade)
description:
Welcome to Rong - a brand new hyper-casual ring game. Need something quick and fun to pick up? Challenge yourself with Rong!

The idea is simple. Just tap the screen when the pointer is on a color, but remember the quicker you are the better you will do! One missed tap and you will have to restart the level, and no one level will be the same to keep you going for hours on end.

Challenge your friends to compete for the best score, see who can unlock all the themes first, or just try to dominate on the leaderboard.

The more you play, the more stars you can collect to unlock new themes and custom features. Rong will notify you on ways to gain bonus stars during special events and holidays.

Are you up for the challenge? Download Rong!
